post:
We now operate 2 dedicated server brands to meet all your needs!

ServerStadium - Low cost instant dedicated servers
StealthyHosting - Customizable dedicated servers

99.9 Up Time SLA
SOC-1/SSAE16 Type II Audited Facility
24/7/365 On-Site staff

**Our Datacenter:
Power**
* 2N AC UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supplies) systems in case of power failure. Designed to hold load long enough for main power to be transferred to backup generator.
* Our datacenter has multiple service contracts with local fueling companies.
- Backup Generators are routinely tested to ensure proper uptime and reliability.
 
**Security**

- Keycard and Biometric scanning security are utilized to gain access to datacenter.
- Locking suites and cabinets.
- 24/7 security camera surveillance with security personnel.
- Authorized personnel only in our datacenter.
 
 
**Environment**

* Redundant datacenter grade HVAC systems configured as N+1 redundancy to ensure proper cooling in event of HVAC unit malfunction.
* VESDA Air sampling and smoke detection system.
- Multiple zone Pre-action fire suppression
- Third party fire monitoring company, 24 X 7

**Network**

* Redundant enterprise BGP network
* Multiple Fiber carriers in building
- Multi 10-Gigabit and 100-Gigabit capable backbone providers.
- Direct connectivity to the SIX (Seattle Internet Exchange) available
- **Corero DDoS filtering**
A very base level of ddos filtering is provided for all IPs, if an attack is larger than this level we implement an automated nullroute system that will temporary nullroute the attacked IP leaving the remaining IPs and server online.

Test IP: 192.169.68.1
Test files: [100mb](http://StealthyHosting.com/100mb.test) [1000mb](http://StealthyHosting.com/1000mb.test)


**ServerStadium Instant dedicated servers**
OS install starts immediately after payment, typically ready in 15-30 minutes.

Each server includes:
- 10TB on 1Gbps Port
- 5 usable IPs (additional IP blocks available)
